sen.e: Washio KANO (December 14, 1839 - October 27, 1902) was an officer and corporal of Shinsen-gumi masterless warriors' party and later, became Goryo-eshi (guardians of Imperial mausoleums) (Kodaiji-to party.)

Washio KANO (December 14, 1839 - October 27, 1902) was an officer and corporal of the Shinsen-gumi masterless warriors' party; he later became a member of Goryo-eji (guardians of Imperial mausoleums) party (Kodaiji-to party).

sen.j: 塾頭伊東甲子太郎（後の甲子太郎）に師事し、一方で、篠原泰之進と共に窪田治部右衛門の神奈川奉行所勤務に随行し、横浜市外国人居留地の警備の任にもついていた。
sen.e: He studied under Kinetaro ITO (later, Kinetaro) as a school manager, and on other hand, with Tainoshin SHINOHARA, he went to Kanagawa Magistrate's office where Jibu'uemon KUBOTA was working to be on a security mission for Yokohama City's Enclave for foreign residents.

He studied under Kinetaro ITO (later, Kinetaro) as a school manager, while also working with Tainoshin SHINOHARA at the Kanagawa Magistrate's office (also where Jibu'uemon KUBOTA worked) on security for Yokohama City's Enclave for foreign residents.

sen.j: 翌年春の組織再編で伍長となったが、慶応3年（1867年）三月に伊東を盟主として結成された御陵衛士（高台寺党）に参加し、新選組を離脱した。
sen.e: He became a corporal upon an organizational restructuring in spring of the following year, but in March 1867, he left Shinsen-gumi masterless warriors' party to join Goryo-eshi (Kodaiji-to party) which was organized by ITOH as its leader.

sen.e: In November of the same year, he was successful about escaping troubles in the Abura-no-koji Incident in which ITO was assassinated by Shinsen-gumi masterless warriors' party, and was sheltered at Satsuma-Hantei (Satsuma domain's residence maintained by a daimyo in Edo.)

sen.j: 同年12月18日、篠原泰之進ら御陵衛士残党とともに油小路事件の報復として、伏見街道で近藤勇を襲撃。
sen.e: On December 18 of the same year, he assaulted Isami KONDO on Fushimi-kaido Road together with Tainoshin SHINOHARA and other rump of Goryo-eshi (guardians of Imperial mausoleums) to retaliate against the Abura-no-koji Incident.

sen.j: 慶応4年（1868年）正月の鳥羽伏見の戦いから始まる戊辰戦争では、赤報隊を経て薩摩軍に属して戦う。
